title: Not Just Pogi’s Water Boys: UAE Emirates’ New Generation Lays Warning with Asturian Annihilation
content:
Overall victory and three wins in three days by 2000s babies Del Toro, Morgado, Fisher-Black puts WorldTour on watch for seasons to come.

Read the full article at Not Just Pogi’s Water Boys: UAE Emirates’ New Generation Lays Warning with Asturian Annihilation on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
